snippet: Creativity is all about making choices that the automatic setting takes away. Two professional photographers, Rachel Devine and Peta Mazey, offer the basics of going manual.
abstract: Creativity is all about making choices that the automatic setting takes away. Two professional photographers, Rachel Devine and Peta Mazey, offer the basics of going manual.
lead_paragraph: Creativity is all about making choices. But when you set your camera to automatic, as so many do, the camera makes the choices for you. If you want to be creative, the first thing you have to do is turn off the automatic setting.

headline.main: Five Easy Steps to Simple Camera Mastery
